author: Special Correspondent
text:
Electoral roll purification work to remove names of deceased people and double entries will begin on Monday.

Virudhunagar Collector V. Rajaraman, in a statement, said that the work would be carried out till February 29 as per instructions of the Election Commission of India.

Verification

The details of the deceased voters would be verified by booth-level officers.

Steps would be taken to remove unqualified entries by following the laid-down procedures, he said.
title: Electoral roll purification
